title: GET_VEHICLE_DOOR_ANGLE_RATIO
content:
0xFE3F9C29F7B32BD50x0E399C26// GetVehicleDoorAngleRatio
float GET_VEHICLE_DOOR_ANGLE_RATIO(Vehicle vehicle, int doorIndex);Parameters:vehicle: VehicledoorIndex: Index of door to checkReturns: A float representing angle of door mapped from 0.0 to 1.0Checks the angle of the door mapped from 0.0 - 1.0 where 0.0 is fully closed and 1.0 is fully open.See eDoorId declared in SET_VEHICLE_DOOR_SHUTExamples:Lualocal veh = GetVehiclePedIsIn(PlayerPedId()
-- check if driver door is open
if GetVehicleDoorAngleRatio(veh, 0) > 0.0 then
  print("Driver door is open!)
end
codeBlocks:
// GetVehicleDoorAngleRatio

if GetVehicleDoorAngleRatio(veh, 0) > 0.0 then
end
